mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_nickname, user_name, user_address, user_email, user_phone) values (seq_user.nextval, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userNickname}, #{userName}, #{userAddress}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone})
mapper.select: select user_no as userNo, user_id as userId, user_pw as userPw, user_nickname as userNickname, user_name as userName, user_address as userAddress, user_email as userEmail, user_phone as userPhone, user_type as userType, enroll_date as enrollDate, acct_level as acctLevel, ban_yn as banYN, user_image as userImage from tbl_user where user_id = #{userId} and user_pw = #{userPw}
